text: aur (vah vakt bhee yaad karo) jab hamane tumase kaha ki is gaanv (areeha) mein jao aur isamen jahaan chaaho pharaagat se khao (piyo) aur daravaaze par sajada karate hue aur zabaan se hitta bakhshish kahate hue aao to ham tumhaaree khata ye bakhsh dege aur ham nekee karane vaalon kee nekee (savaab) badha degen
